snippet.title: Tennis for Two - The Original Video Game
snippet.description:
Tennis for Two is commonly regarded as the original video game. You can bounce on over and read, watch, listen and play the history of Tennis for Two at my video game history website The Dot Eaters: https://thedoteaters.com/?bitstory=bitstory-article-1/tennis-for-two

Designed by William Higinbotham in 1958 at Brookhaven National Labs on Long Island, NY,  This video features a reproduced version of Tennis for Two built at Brookhaven using original components, for its 50th anniversary.

Facebook 🕹️ https://www.facebook.com/thedoteaters
Twitter 🕹️  https://twitter.com/doteaters
YouTube 🕹️ https://www.youtube.com/user/Umma6umma
Pinterest 🕹️ https://www.pinterest.com/thedoteaters/

-~-~~-~~~-~~-~-
View the goofy glitch that makes playing Access Software's classic game Leader Board Golf so much fun: 
https://youtu.be/HnEN942x5rY
-~-~~-~~~-~~-~-
